name: queenly-majesty
caption: Queenly Majesty

effect.short: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
effect.full: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

flavorText:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
